name: Breakout (itch) (Moonlight_Studio2510)
description:
Breakout is a classic game from mid-70's. A layer of bricks lines the top third of the screen and the goal is to destroy them all by repeatedly bouncing a ball off a paddle into them. This is not original game, but we think you'll enjoy it. It easy to play and it's fun.

If you find any bugs or glitches contact us on our email moonlight.studio2510@gmail.com
